## Mindmaps
### [GitMind](https://gitmind.com) 
 (2022-12-20) It is a very satisfying cloud-based mindmap service. For example, it is easy to move existing nodes to other node. You can export the mindmap as a Word file as hierarchical bullets. Free up to 10 mindmaps.
